biography:
𝙇𝙖𝙧𝙜𝙚𝙨𝙩 𝙉𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙖𝙡 𝘽𝙚𝙖𝙪𝙩𝙮 𝘾𝙤𝙢𝙥𝙖𝙣𝙮
Discover Our Iconic Brands: Wardah | Make Over | Emina | Kahf | & Explore More 👇🏻👇🏻👇🏻

latestPosts.caption:
For us, we grow because we choose to be beneficial.💙

#ParagonCorp #ParaGoNation

Di saat langkah terasa berat bagi saudara-saudara kita di Sumatra, setiap uluran tangan, setiap doa, dan setiap kehadiran menjadi cahaya harapan, hadir dari langkah kecil yang tulus, dari hati yang memilih untuk peduli.

Terima kasih kepada Paragonian, pelanggan, dan semua yang ikut bergerak bersama.
Yang datang bukan hanya untuk melihat, tapi untuk menemani.
Yang mungkin tak bisa menghapus luka, namun ingin menyalakan kembali harapan.

Kita percaya bahwa duka akan menemukan ruang untuk bernapas. Dan dari sana, harapan akan tumbuh, di hati, di rumah, dan di tanah yang sedang kita doakan bersama.

#BergerakNyalakanHarapan untuk Sumatra.

#ParagonCorp #ParaGoNation

A proud milestone for ParagonCorp.

We are honored to share that Ibu Nurhayati Subakat has received the Lifetime Achievement Award from Female Daily, acknowledging her extraordinary contribution, leadership, and transformative role in the growth of Indonesia’s beauty industry.

Her vision of meaningful beauty and empowerment continues to inspire generations.

Congratulations, Ibu Nur! This recognition reflects the impact you’ve built, and the legacy that will continue to shine. 🤍✨

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ParaGoNation

Di tengah ujian yang datang tanpa aba-aba, setiap dukungan kecil menjadi cahaya harapan bagi saudara-saudara kita di Sumatra.

Kita hadir bukan sekadar melihat, tapi merasakan. Kita satukan hati, tenaga, dan doa, karena ujian terasa lebih ringan jika dipikul bersama.

Terima kasih kepada seluruh Paragonian, pelanggan, dan masyarakat yang selalu ada, yang saling jaga, dan terus peduli.

Bersama, kita satukan langkah, untuk terus menyalakan harapan.

#ParagonCorp #ParaGoNation

ParagonCorp has been awarded at the Trend Maker Summit 2025, a recognition of our commitment to human-centered innovation shaped by real consumer voices.

At the event, Putri Nindhia Kirana (Global Group Head Consumer Market Foresight ParagonCorp) presented UNMUTED: From Consumers’ Feedback to Breakthrough Innovation, showcasing how we listen, decode, and transform consumer behaviors and aspirations into actionable foresight that fuels meaningful, cross-category innovation.

This recognition reflects more than an achievement, it reaffirms our belief that the future is built by putting people at the center and turning insights into innovations that truly matter.

#ParagonCorp #P40 #TrendMaker2025

“Fragnance is like your clothes. You should try the perfume directly on your skin.” - Ben Foatelli, global perfumer of Kahf Aquaterrae

Kahf /DECODE
📅 26–30 Nov 2025
📍 Pondok Indah Mall 2
🎟️ Secure your spot now: www.kahfeveryday.com/en/decode

#Kahf #KahfDecode #SkincarePria #DecodeYourSkin #decode1 #BeautyScienceTech #BST2026

6.300+ Kahf Bro sudah terDECODE di hari kedua.

Masih tersisa beberapa hari untuk merasakan pengalaman ini, mulai dari menggunakan teknologi terbaru hingga konsultasi langsung dengan para expert yang kami hadirkan di Kahf / DECODE.

Kahf /DECODE
📅 26–30 Nov 2025
📍 Pondok Indah Mall 2
🎟️ Secure your spot now: www.kahfeveryday.com/en/decode

#Kahf #KahfDecode #SkincarePria #DecodeYourSkin #decode1

Technology ini bisa membantu kamu memahami gaya rambut yang cocok dengan bentuk wajahmu.

Kahf /DECODE

📍 Pondok Indah Mall 2

#Kahf #KahfDecode #SkincarePria #DecodeYourSkin #decode1

Marcel Ferragi melihat skincare dari satu titik awal, yaitu kulit yang sehat. Kuncinya ada di dua hal: pahami jenis kulitmu dan pilih skincare yang mendukung kenyamananmu.

#Kahf #KahfDecode #SkincarePria #DecodeYourSkin #decode1

Air yang mengalir hari ini…
adalah jawaban dari perjalanan yang tak pernah berhenti.

Dari langkah yang lelah, doa yang panjang,
dan harapan yang tak pernah padam.

28 November 2025 —
hari ketika aliran itu akhirnya datang lebih dekat,
menemani langkah-langkah yang dulu terasa begitu panjang.

Untuk hidup yang lebih baik.
Untuk harapan yang lebih bermakna.

#Wardah
#BeautyForTheGreaterGood
#LangkahAlirkanHarapan

Setiap senyum yang tumbuh di desa-desa terpencil… dimulai dari akses pada air bersih.

Lewat #LangkahAlirkanHarapan, ParagonCorp dan Wardah berkolaborasi bersama Komodo Water untuk menghadirkan langkah nyata. Agar air bersih bisa mengalir lebih dekat, lebih aman, dan lebih layak untuk mereka yang paling membutuhkannya.

Karena satu sumber air bisa mengubah langkah, membuka kesempatan, dan mengalirkan harapan bagi banyak keluarga.

#Wardah
#BeautyForTheGreaterGood

Esok, langkah besar dimulai di NTT.

Bersama para sosok visioner:
Shana Fatina (Founder Komodo Water), Retno Marsudi (UN Secretary-General Special Envoy on Water), dr. Sari Chairunnisa (Deputy CEO Paragon Corp), dan Emanuel Melkiades (Gubernur NTT) —
ParagonCorp dan Wardah meresmikan Clean Water Initiative NTT, sebuah komitmen nyata dalam gerakan #LangkahAlirkanHarapan.

Upacara peresmian ini akan dilaksanakan pada 28 November 2025 di Desa Lempe, titik awal di mana aliran air bersih akan semakin dekat bagi ribuan keluarga.

Karena ketika air mengalir, harapan pun ikut tumbuh.

#Wardah
#BeautyForTheGreaterGood

Behind every number, every process, and every breakthrough, there is purpose.

A purpose that drives us to grow with integrity.
A purpose that ensures our innovations create real value.
A purpose that keeps sustainability at the core of how we move.

This award is more than a recognition, it is proof of disciplined leadership, a resilient culture, and a collective commitment to serve Indonesia better each year.

Here’s to progress that is conscious, consistent, and meaningful.
And to the Paragonians who make it possible.

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ParaGoNation bestmanaged SEABestManaged

Stepping into the Paragon Experience Space at ADGI Design Week 2025 felt like entering a world where creativity speaks through every sense.

A place where design, innovation, and storytelling fuse into one continuous exploration.

Thank you for exploring this journey with us.
Here’s to designing a future where imagination keeps evolving. 💙✨

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ADGIDesignWeek2025

Di balik setiap tetes air yang sampai di rumah… 

Ada ibu yang berangkat setelah Subuh, menempuh jalan panjang, dan pulang menjelang siang.

Air bukan hanya kebutuhan — tapi napas bagi keluarga. Untuk memasak, mencuci, mandi, wudhu… semuanya bergantung pada langkah-langkah mereka.

Inilah cerita perjuangan para ibu — dan lewat Langkah Alirkan Harapan, kami belajar bahwa perjuangan seperti ini tidak boleh berjalan sendirian. 🩵

#Wardah
#ForTheGreaterGood
#BeautyForTheGreaterGood
#LangkahAlirkanHarapan

Kadang, harapan tidak datang lewat hal besar.

Ia hadir lewat langkah-langkah kecil yang sering terlewatkan — air yang mengalir, tangan yang saling membantu, dan cerita-cerita yang menunggu untuk didengar.

Akan ada banyak kisah yang ingin kami bagi. 
Dan semuanya dimulai dari sini. 💧

#Wardah 
#ForTheGreaterGood 
#BeautyForTheGreaterGood 
#LangkahAlirkanHarapan

From visual–scent exploration to sensations you didn’t expect, Sinestesia invites you to experience how senses intertwine and imagination expands.

Taman Ismail Marzuki | 19–23 November 2025

Indonesia Best Managed Companies
Not once. Not twice. But three years in a row.

This recognition reflects our journey, a journey shaped by purpose-driven growth, where ambition is guided by meaning. Where innovation answers real human needs. Where sustainability goes beyond compliance and becomes a long-term commitment. And where every Paragonian is empowered to create impact that truly matters.

This is what sets us apart, year after year: a consistent dedication to responsible, purposeful progress that continues to move us forward.

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ParaGoNation #bestmanaged #SEABestManaged

Experience the best of beauty, innovation, and design, only at the Paragon Experience Space.

From immersive brand showcases to hands-on creative labs, step inside and discover how we design with purpose and push ideas forward. 

Come explore it all at Taman Ismail Marzuki, 19–23 November 2025.

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ADGIDesignWeek2025

Exploring ADGI Design Week 2025 and planning to stop by the Paragon Experience Space?

Follow this guide to make your journey easier and your experience even better.

Taman Ismail Marzuki | November 19–23, 2025

Throwback to a moment that meant more than just a win.

At the FMCG Awards, ParagonCorp marked a new milestone, becoming the only Indonesian company to secure three awards in one night, through the excellence of our brand @wardahbeauty, @makeoverid, and @kahfeveryday. 

Thank you for being part of this journey. Your support is the reason we continue to grow, create, and make meaningful impact. 💙

#ParagonCorp #P40 #FMCGAwards2025

You’re invited to Sinestesia!
an exhibition by ParagonCorp at ADGI Design Week 2025, exploring the world of Sinestesia where senses blend and imagination expands.

19–23 November 2025 | Taman Ismail Marzuki.

A milestone from Indonesia to Asia.

This year, ParagonCorp stands as the only company from Indonesia to take home 3 FMCG Awards at once, through the outstanding achievements of Wardah, Make Over, and Kahf.

Thank you for being part of this journey, it’s all because of you! 💙

You’re invited to explore the Paragon Experience Space at ADGI Design Week 2025, a space where creativity, sensory innovation, brand storytelling, and design experimentation come together.

At ADGI Design Week 2025, we invite all creative minds to discover how design and innovation intertwine in every creation, revealing the unseen artistry that shapes the beauty industry.

From visual–scent exploration, fast-paced creative challenges, and inspiring design conversations, to interactive installations that rethink how innovation works, every corner is crafted to show how ParagonCorp brings innovation into design.

Celebrate creativity with us at Taman Ismail Marzuki,
19–23 November 2025.

#ParagonCorp #P40 #ADGIDesignWeek2025

Behind every number, every process, and every breakthrough, there is purpose.

A purpose that drives us to grow with integrity.
A purpose that ensures our innovations create real value.
A purpose that keeps sustainability at the core of how we move.

This award is more than a recognition, it is proof of disciplined leadership, a resilient culture, and a collective commitment to serve Indonesia better each year.

Here’s to progress that is conscious, consistent, and meaningful.
And to the Paragonians who make it possible.
